title: A Car That Turns
author: Amir Rajan
description: It's about a car that turns.

title: A Letter to Luna
author: seasalty
description: A very short rhythm game created for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam.  Use the power of music to send your letter! Score well enough and you might even get something back...

title: adrift
author: ahnlak
description: The aim of the game is simple; keep your spaceship on the screen. How long can you last?

title: BombChain
author: Kanaz312
description: Blow up as many bombs as you can in one big chain reaction!

title: Bug Count
author: J. B. Pichelski
description: Just as frustrating as finding real computer bugs Count how many bugs appear on the screen. The more you get right, the harder it gets.

title: cakestack
author: Steria773
description: Simple cake stacking game done in Ruby via DragonRuby GTK!

title: Cat Herder 2020
author: danhealy
description: The ultimate 20-second herding cats simulator.

title: Cloud Miner
author: phasefx
description: 20 seconds for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam

title: Collect the Dots
author: kfischer_okarin
description: Collect all the dots within 20 seconds.

title: Deliver the Packages!
author: otaconio
description: Deliver the packages before time runs out!

title: Dink
author: jeorb, aecium
description: Dink is a 20 second retro gaming hit of nostalgia.

title: Dragon Quest Rush
author: meltinglight
description: This game was done for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2020. It is my first game.

title: DragonJump
author: Cutiekittypet
description: Mini platformer game for TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam.

title: Emerald Eater
author: arkive
description: Collect the emeralds. Avoid the red bumpers.

title: Fake Moon
author: Grotesk
description: Guide your fake moon to catch all the lunar landers. You have twenty seconds, don't miss any! It is inspired by a certain kind of old-school handheld game and is dedicated to conspiracy theorists everywhere.

title: Get Crackin'
author: phantomxii
description: The difference between success and failure is twenty seconds! Crack that safe and claim the valuables within before the police arrive! But in order to do that, you must enter the combination properly!

title: Ghost Trap
author: robotspacefish
description: Catch as many ghosts as you can in 20 seconds.

title: Lunar Drone Lander
author: dcsw
description: 20 seconds to land on the moving landing pad without crashing into it.

title: Mato - The TeenyTiny Tech Demo
author: CANICVS
description: Use your jetpack to fly across the map as fast as possible!

title: Mean Muggin'
author: ha1fie
description: Catch the mug before it falls off the table!

title: Mother of Rugrats
author: Lernakow
description: Thou shall not sleep!

title: padok
author: toinebeg
description: A simple maze game. Click on the octogons to find the path between the colored nodes.

title: Persolvo
author: Sabrina
description: This is a single level prototype puzzle game that I built as a part of the teeny tiny game jam, in an attempt to learn DragonRuby.

title: Pop It
author: GameDevMatt
description: here is the simple story of the Ninja who want to improve his skills, So he sets a timer of 20 Secs and tries to hit the balloon as many times as he is able.

title: Quest for the Youth Potion
author: Ninus Hideon
description: Help the mage get his youth potion!

title: Slay the Lich
author: HIRO-R-B
description: The world is about to be destroyed by a Lich. Save it with your arrow keys!

title: Slime Jump
author: HIRO-R-B
description: You're a slime and you like floaty orbs. Jump and catch them!

title: Spotlight Search
author: Miriad
description: A cute "keep him in the spotlight!" game I whipped up as a sample for TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam!

title: SwatGame
author: Cutiekittypet
description: Swat as many bugs as you can in 20 seconds!

title: Teeny Tiny Smithy
author: Xed
description: An apprentice must step in to save the village after the smithy's untimely demise. The blacksmith is dead! Dark denizens approach... Craft weapons. Slay them before time runs out!

title: Teeny Tiny Space Game
author: guitsaru
description: A 20 second space shooter

title: TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam SimpleSample
author: Grotesk
description: When the game tells you to click on a coloured shape, click on it. Don't make any mistakes! That's all there is to it!

title: The Ghost Of Flash Ads Past
author: mikemar10
description: Relive the early 2000's and try to win a prize! Holiday Edition! Heavily inspired by the flash ads from the early 2000's that would demand you punch the monkey

title: Tiny Plumbing
author: m4rek
description: Connect the left side to the right side, click tiles to rotate them. You have 20 seconds to score as high as you can.

title: Tiny Ski
author: spunos
description: Move the mouse to control the skier. Don't hit any trees (or bears). Try to survive for 20 seconds!

title: V-na√Ør
author: jujule
description: Bullet Hell meets QTE

title: Vertices!
author: ahnlak
description: Vertices is a simple game, where you have 20 seconds to click on the shapes with the fewest vertices, or sides.  Can you clear 10 shapes before the time runs out? What about 20?! More?!?!
